title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Telecommunications (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Telecommunications (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited telecommunication (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

(2) References to the Department of the Environment, Climate and 
Communications contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and 
relating to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, 
from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (2) reference department environment climate communication contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media the name of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function 
transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [237] 3 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order 
to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media be carried 
on or completed on or after such commencement by the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister environment climate communication may far relates function transferred order minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium carried completed commencement minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

to
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References
text_raw:
7. References 

the Minister for 

the Environment, Climate and 
Communications contained in the constitution of any company and relating to 
any function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications, in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, 
on such commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications shall, on the request of the Minister 
for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
